Articles.Content: Anyone have a Mun train (road train) or even a Kerbin train that can have parts added on and taken off through docking ports?
I've seen people with Kethane trains on the mun, I don't know however if you could remove/add parts though. I'm sorry I can't provide you with a link I don't remember where I saw it
